languages.text: "Богохульство! В случае дальнейшего кощунственного упоминания священных литаний и еретического искажения философии благословенного Амарната ты будешь уничтожен!"
"Blasphemy! Should you continue these sacrilegious mentions of sacred litanies and heretical perversions of the blessed Amarnat's philosophy, you will be destroyed!"
languages.original_text: "Богохульство! В случае дальнейшего кощунственного упоминания священных литаний и еретического искажения философии благословенного Амарната ты будешь уничтожен!"

traits.locale_text: "Blasphemy! Should you continue these sacrilegious mentions of sacred litanies and heretical perversions of blessed Amarnat's philosophy, you will be destroyed!"
"Blasphemy! Should you continue these sacrilegious mentions of sacred litanies and heretical perversions of blessed Amarnat's philosophy, you will be destroyed!"
"Blasphemy! Should you continue these sacrilegious mentions of sacred litanies and heretical perversions of the blessed Amarnat's philosophy, you will be destroyed!"
"Blasphemy! Should you continue these sacrilegious mentions of sacred litanies and heretical perversions of the blessed Amarnat's philosophy, you will be destroyed!"
"Blasphemy! Should you continue these sacrilegious mentions of sacred litanies and heretical perversions of the blessed Amarnat's philosophy, you will be destroyed!"

languages.text: 「冒涜だ！神聖なる典礼を冒涜し、祝福されしアマルナトの哲学を異端へと曲解する行為を続けるようならば、あなたは滅ぼされるであろう！」
languages.original_text: "Blasphemy! Should you continue these sacrilegious mentions of sacred litanies and heretical perversions of the blessed Amarnat's philosophy, you will be destroyed!"

traits.locale_text: 「冒涜だ！神聖なる典礼を冒涜し、祝福されしアマルナトの哲学を異端へと曲解する行為を続けるようならば、あなたは滅ぼされるであろう！」

languages.text: “亵渎之言！如果你敢继续亵渎神圣的祷文，继续肆意扭曲蒙福者阿玛纳特的教诲，我会亲手将你消灭！”
languages.original_text: "Blasphemy! Should you continue these sacrilegious mentions of sacred litanies and heretical perversions of the blessed Amarnat's philosophy, you will be destroyed!"

traits.locale_text: “亵渎之言！如果你敢继续亵渎神圣的祷文，继续肆意扭曲蒙福者阿玛纳特的教诲，我会亲手将你消灭！”

languages.text: « Sacrilège ! Si vous continuez à proférer de telles litanies et perversions sacrilèges sur la philosophie d'Amarnat le béni, vous serez détruit ! »
languages.original_text: "Blasphemy! Should you continue these sacrilegious mentions of sacred litanies and heretical perversions of the blessed Amarnat's philosophy, you will be destroyed!"

traits.locale_text: « Sacrilège ! Si vous continuez à proférer de telles litanies et perversions sacrilèges sur la philosophie d'Amarnat le béni, vous serez détruit ! »

languages.text: «¡Blasfemia! Como continúe mencionando las sagradas letanías de forma blasfema y pervirtiendo la filosofía del bendito Amarnat, ¡lo destruiré!».
languages.original_text: "Blasphemy! Should you continue these sacrilegious mentions of sacred litanies and heretical perversions of the blessed Amarnat's philosophy, you will be destroyed!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Blasfemia! Como continúe mencionando las sagradas letanías de forma blasfema y pervirtiendo la filosofía del bendito Amarnat, ¡lo destruiré!».

languages.text: "Blasphemie! Solltet Ihr diese frevlerischen Erwähnungen heiliger Litaneien und diese ketzerischen Perversionen der Philosophie des gesegneten Amarnat fortführen, werdet Ihr vernichtet!"
languages.original_text: "Blasphemy! Should you continue these sacrilegious mentions of sacred litanies and heretical perversions of the blessed Amarnat's philosophy, you will be destroyed!"

traits.locale_text: "Blasphemie! Solltet Ihr diese frevlerischen Erwähnungen heiliger Litaneien und diese ketzerischen Perversionen der Philosophie des gesegneten Amarnat fortführen, werdet Ihr vernichtet!"

languages.text: "Dine aykırılık! Kutsal ayinlere dil uzatmaya ve kutsanmış Amarnat'ın felsefesini kâfirane bir şekilde saptırmaya devam edersen yok edileceksin!"
languages.original_text: "Blasphemy! Should you continue these sacrilegious mentions of sacred litanies and heretical perversions of the blessed Amarnat's philosophy, you will be destroyed!"

traits.locale_text: "Küfür! Kutsal ayinlere dil uzatmaya ve kutsanmış Amarnat'ın felsefesini kâfirane bir şekilde saptırmaya devam edersen yok edileceksin!"
